item.title: Black manhattan
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky or bourbon
  • 30 ml amaro
  • 2 dashes aromatic bitters
  • 2 dashes orange bitters
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Stir ingredients over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Brandy crusta
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml brandy
  • 15 ml triple sec
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur (optional)
  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) sugar
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Sugar rim a cocktail glass. Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with long lemon twist lining the inside of the glass.

item.title: Martini
item.description:
This is a “traditional” Martini with a greater amount of vermouth than is common today. Decrease the vermouth as you see fit. Make sure the drink and glass are cold.

Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml dry vermouth
  • 2 dashes orange bitters
  • (garnish) lemon twist or olives

Instructions

Stir ingredients over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Pisco sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml pisco
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1/2 egg white
  • (garnish) aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with drops of bitters and a lime slice.
